title: Profiler for Python 2.7
body_html:
Running prof = torch.autograd.profiler.load_nvprof('trace_name.prof') on Python 2.7 causes an error:
NameError: global name 'FileNotFoundError' is not defined and according to here, FileNotFoundError apparently doesn't exist in python 2.7.
A simple solution that worked for me is to add to the beginning of torch/autograd/profiler.py file the following lines:

try:
    FileNotFoundError
except NameError:
    #py2
    FileNotFoundError = IOError

Which I got from here.

PS:
I can create a PR if you agree with the solution.

Cheers,

Running prof = torch.autograd.profiler.load_nvprof('trace_name.prof') on Python 2.7 causes an error:
NameError: global name 'FileNotFoundError' is not defined and according to here, FileNotFoundError apparently doesn't exist in python 2.7.
A simple solution that worked for me is to add to the beginning of torch/autograd/profiler.py file the following lines:
try:
    FileNotFoundError
except NameError:
    #py2
    FileNotFoundError = IOError

Which I got from here.
PS:
I can create a PR if you agree with the solution.
Cheers,
body:
Running `prof = torch.autograd.profiler.load_nvprof('trace_name.prof')` on Python 2.7 causes an error:
`NameError: global name 'FileNotFoundError' is not defined` and according to [here](https://github.com/philkr/lpo/issues/5#issuecomment-100596671), FileNotFoundError apparently doesn't exist in python 2.7.
A simple solution that worked for me is to add to the beginning of torch/autograd/profiler.py file the following lines:

```
try:
    FileNotFoundError
except NameError:
    #py2
    FileNotFoundError = IOError
```

Which I got from [here](https://stackoverflow.com/a/21368622/850760).

PS:
I can create a PR if you agree with the solution.

Cheers,
